website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-clean, compact trash can that's perfect for small bathrooms.
pros: Stainless steel design makes it easy to keep clean
cons: Smaller than what some were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was too expensive to splurge on. I’m so glad I did ! It’s perfect in my “ all chrome design bathroom “
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this! Looks great next to my chrome & glass desk! Can also be used to set a house plant in. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy trash can with nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in perfect condition. The trash can is solid, sturdy and perfect for the purpose and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kras

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, so much better than the ones that are plastic made to look like stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Not likely this will dent easily. And a perfect size for my powder room.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: when I opened the package it was easy to see the rim was bent pretty substantially
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for which it was meant; however, when I opened the package it was easy to see the rim was bent pretty substantially. Thankfully, it's just a trashcan!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Sleek design. Perfect size for under my bathroom vanity.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I love the polished look in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: DWray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my bathroom and reflects my new cement tile flooe design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect waste can for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Priced right, arrived on time and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really nice trash can for our bathroom!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived perfect. It is a bit larger than expected, but that is just fine. It fits perfectly in the small space between the toilet and the vanity in our newly remodeled bathroom. Looks great in there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Heavyweight Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: Love this wastebasket. It's the perfect size for our guest bath, and it's a solid, heavy stainless steel with a modern, polished finish. It's definitely easy to clean, and looks great. A big improvement over the plastic wastebasket we had before (which eventually cracked), and at a reasonable cost. This one should last forever!
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty place to put your trash.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful garbage can...I can't believe I just said that about a garbage can. Excellent quality. It is actually a bit larger than it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: yrsokul

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great quality. Worth the splurge!
customer_reviews.text: Why should anyone pay $25 for a little trash can? Because it's this one. First, it's not plastic, which is just- nice to have real, quality, enduring things. Second, this is well made (double walled, strong, dent and scratch resistant. Third- I got no end of compliments. (I saw it at a friend's place, thought it was fancy, Looked for cheaper ones. Then splurged.) This really brings durabilty, and a clean look, to any bathroom, kitchen, etc and - satinelss steel. My friend's hasn't rusted etc, and is dent free after years of use. Still shiny and bright, and easy to clean and sanitize. Worth the small splurge.
customer_reviews.author: nyc amazn customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wastebasket for bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my toddler broke the porcelain wastebasket I had in our master bath. The finish on this and simple design as well as the great price sold me. So glad I did, it looks great, nice quality and so far unbreakable by little hands.
customer_reviews.author: BostonBean9

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight stainless trash can. Looks great in my bathroom; however, it could be a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: RFB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting and very timely delivery! 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: mDesign Small Round Metal Trash Can Wastebasket, Garbage Container Bin for Bathrooms, Powder Rooms, Kitchens, Home Offices - Polished Stainless Steel
feature_bullets: COMPACT DESIGN: This round can is the perfect size for inside cabinets, under counters, under sinks and other small spaces
FUNCTIONAL & VERSATILE: The size and style make this can work is so many places throughout your home; Also great for dorm rooms, campers, RVs and apartments
EASY TO CLEAN: Wipe clean with a damp cloth
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of strong stainless steel with a durable rust-resistant finish
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 9.5" diameter x 10.25" high
